definition: to win a ballot/to draw a lucky number
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to sign one's name/visa/variant of 籤|签[qian1]
inscribed bamboo stick (used in divination, gambling, drawing lots etc)/small wood sliver/label/tag

sentences.english: A shareholder account has two owners that he can not do registration.
sentences.chinese: 一账号挂两股东账户一人中签股票无法转登记。

definition: to ask to buy/to bid for purchase
to undertake to purchase sth/to subscribe (to share issue)
to win a prize/a successful gamble
to win (a prize in a lottery)
to randomly select (as for a lottery)/to take a number (for queuing)

to send off (player for a foul)/to knock out (i.e. to beat in a knock-out tournament)/to eliminate/to call out/to kill off/to pull out of (a competition)/to retire (a runner in baseball)/out (i.e. man out in baseball)
